thread.title: Midway Drive-in organizers announce 2015 Halloween Horrorfest lineup
thread.title_full: Midway Drive-in organizers announce 2015 Halloween Horrorfest lineup | syracuse.com

author: Katrina Tulloch | ktulloch@syracuse.com
title: Midway Drive-in organizers announce 2015 Halloween Horrorfest lineup
text:
MINETTO, N.Y. -- From Oct. 30 to Nov. 1, the Midway Drive-In movie theater will host a Halloween Horrorfest with multiple screenings of 2015 horror flicks.
Â» 25 Halloween parties in Central New York
The Midway's Halloween movie schedule is not suited for children. M. Night Shyamalan's "The Visit" is rated PG-13, but "Tales of Halloween," "Cooties," "Goodnight Mummy" and "Knock Knock" are rated R.
The Horrorfest will offer five movies for $8 per person on Friday and Saturday. On Sunday, Nov. 1 a triple feature will be available.
See trailers for all five features:
Where: Midway Drive-in at 2475 NY-48, Minetto.
When: Screenings begin at 7 p.m. on Friday, Oct. 30, Saturday, Oct. 31 and Sunday, Nov. 1. (This weekend, Oct. 23-25, the Midway will screen three PG-rated movies: "Goosebumps," "Pan" and "The Walk.")
How much: Admission is $8 for adults.
Katrina Tulloch writes features and entertainment stories for Syracuse.com and The Post-Standard. Contact her: Email | Twitter | Google+
